channel.title: Economics on Gerald Nguyen
channel.description: Recent content in Economics on Gerald Nguyen

item.title: Regional economic development in Vietnam — Reform & “Reorder”
item.description: 35 years of Đổi Mới (Economic Reform) helped Vietnam from a country that had to “run for rice” (see note 1) in the early 1980s to become a middle-income country, reaching the top 20 of the world’s leading economies in terms of international trade. The Reform has turned many poor rural areas into industrial districts, farmers into city dwellers, the number of poor households has decreased sharply, the middle class has increased rapidly… But the Reform process also led to the “Reorder” among provinces and regions.
